title: node v14.21.0. run sisi list-index command
body:
result error:
file:///usr/local/lib/node_modules/@frost-beta/sisi/node_modules/pretty-ms/index.js:49
		valueString ??= String(value);
		            ^^^

SyntaxError: Unexpected token '??='
    at Loader.moduleStrategy (internal/modules/esm/translators.js:145:18)
author: liu-xi-wang

comments.body: Thanks for reporting this, this tool requires Node >= 22 for running, I'll document the requirement.
Unfortunately no, it only supports pictures and there is no plan for videos.
